column2: an A.M. Eatery////As far as what we ordered
column4: so we ordered two Benny duos and had a taste of the chili verde
column7: and Chilaquiles.  I'm sure I botched a couple of the names
column8: sorry!  My favorite was the Bella Bella by far.  I just wish I ordered the full order.  Drunk'n Monkey French toast
column13: and toffee rum drizzle.  Best dish
column14: but for those with high blood sugar
column15: beware!!! I personally would get this to share.  Two-three bites and my dessert fix was fulfilled
